description: Your calls, SMS and contacts hidden on your phone with call blocking. The application is completely hidden, it does not appear on the phone desktop. To start it, it is enough to compose a phone number (1234 default). Thus, nobody can know that you installed this application. CAUTION : ON SOME DEVICE, YOU MUST RESTART THE PHONE SO THAT THE ICON "Androidp" DISAPPEAR ! Available in several languages: Dansk, Deutch, English, Español, Français, Italiano, Nederlands, Norsk, Português, Svenska, 한국어, 中文, 日本語 You can define several blocking type: - No blocking: Calls are not block, but the conversations log (calls and SMS) do not appear in your phone, only in the application - Permanently Block: The phone hangs up again automatically if the contact call you. The list of the blocked calls is present in the application. - Block according to the hour : The contact is blocked only at one certain time of the day (e.g.: between 8:00 and 18:00) Moreover, the application allows: - Blocked masqued call - Set a password (in addition to the phone number to start the application) - Contact import, - Call a phone number (which is not in contacts) without it appearing in the call log, - Send and the receive SMS. Private Network is your ally against the inquisitive eyes, test it and you quickly will find it essential! =>READ ME: LITE VERSION USERS : You must uninstall the lite version before or after you install the premium version to avoid conflicts. Go in the FAQ (below) in the section “Uninstall private network”. CAUTION ! : Some applications of SMS management can affect the proper functioning of “Private Network”. For use in the best conditions, uninstalled other SMS management applications. =>FAQ : - How to start the application? Dial the phone number "1234" (default). The phone will automatically hang up and start the application. You can change this number in the application settings (More menu-> Settings). - How to add a password when starting the application? In the menu "More" select "Settings". In the "Security" section you can enter a password. (Remember the password!). This password will be asked when you first start the application, then each time you select "logout" from the menu "More". - How to force the application to request the password? Select "Logout" in the menu "More." - How to uninstall “Private Network” ? 1- Go to phone settings 2- Select “Applications” 3- Select “Manage Application” 4- Select “Androidp” for premium version or “AndroidpLite” for the lite version 5- Select “Uninstall” =>BUG ? Send an email (in English or French) to: rbigsoft@gmail.com with subject PRIVATE NETWORK BUG. Thank you specifies the model of your phone and your version of Android (In the phone settings, About Phone, Firmware version).
release_text: Version 1.9 : - Critical bug fixed on Android 4.2 (galaxy s4 and others) CAUTION : Launch the app manually from you desktop or google play (without 1234 phone number) after upgrade. The name is "Androidp". The icon disappear after restarting. Please contact me for any problems.

description: FxPro Tools is an all-in-one application designed to provide you with real time market information on a variety of instruments including forex, shares, indices, futures and precious metals. We have had such a positive response from our own clients that we have decided to implement their suggestions and requests, while leaving it free for all users. FxPro Tools Features: Trader's Dashboard: By popular demand we have included FxPro's Trader's Dashboard into this latest version of the app. Find out which currencies are really moving at any time, see where other FxPro traders are currently positioned and gain access to volatility and trades by time information. Economic calendar: Find out what important economic announcements are due to be released and when. Filter them by their importance and by the currencies they have an impact on. Markets: Monitor the real time prices of your favourite instruments and set price alerts. You will be notified via push notification when the instrument(s) you are monitoring reach the target price you have set. Trading calculators: Perform all your trading related calculations in one place including currency conversions, required margin, pip value, stop loss/take profit, swap and cTrader commissions. Blog: Access all of FxPro's much read market analysis and daily market insights from our blog, directly from within your FxPro Tools app. Thank you to all of the users that have made this app a success and keep your suggestions coming! Risk warning: Trading CFDs involves significant risk of loss.
release_text: Thanks for using FxPro Tools! We highly value your feedback and are working to constantly improve your experience of using FxPro Tools. This update includes: - Set alerts for individual events on the economic calendar. You will receive a push notification 5 minutes before the event. - All FxPro instruments now available, including new Shares, Spot Indices and Spot energies. - Candlestick charts now available for each instrument.Chart your favourite instruments at h1, h4, 1d, 1w and 1m durations.

description: As you all have noticed , in my application there is no advertising . But the good times come to an end . Since the main function - a search , the main search box ad unit will not. Ad units will be visible when you use the additional features. If you want to see in the application any additional tools - write (either in the comments or on my website ) ============================================ It's a new version of app "Chemical reactions" The app is designed for offline search inorganic reactions. ============================================= How to use the application. For example, if you want to find a response, on the left side which Al, you need to enter a query Al or Al =. If you want to find the reaction on the right side which MnO2, you need to enter a query = MnO2. Find a reaction in which the left part of NaOH and H2: make a request NaOH H2 or NaOH H2 =. Find a reaction in which the left side of KMnO4, and the right K2SO4: make a request KMnO4 = K2SO4. Attention! Case letters in the query affect the result. That is, if you enter "naoh", as a result of reaction with the participation of "NaOH" will not be found!

description: Mentalisering är att försöka förstå sig själv och andra utifrån tankar och känslor. De flesta människor mentaliserar ganska hyggligt, men alla skulle må bra av att stärka mentaliseringsförmågan ytterligare. Det kan du göra med hjälp av Mentaliseringsappen, som innehåller både grundläggande information, övningar och goda råd. Ment Ali's ring is to try to understand themselves and others based on thoughts and feelings. Most people mentaliserar pretty decently, but all would do well to strengthen mentalizing ability further. You can do this by using Mentaliseringsappen, which include basic information, exercises and advice.

description: **Exclusive version includes all 80 distinct dinosaurs, including a Tyrannosaurus Rex, Triceratops, Spinosaurus, Pteranodon, Adocus and a Therizinosaurus!** *Cynopsis Kids !magination Award Winner - Best Educational App!* *Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner!* Dinosaur Train A to Z is the ultimate dinosaur app for your child from the hit PBS KIDS show Dinosaur Train! This essential bilingual dinosaur collection helps kids build reading skills, and encourages the exploration of life science and natural history through discovery, play and reading! Through the letters of the alphabet, your child will learn about 80 amazing dinosaurs by touching and feeding them, x-raying them, discovering dinosaur facts and more! App Features include: •80 interactive dinosaurs and their corresponding dinosaur letters! •Groups of dinosaurs include horned, armored, crested, water, carnivores, winged and feathered! •Highlighted words throughout the app to build beginning reader skills •Available in both English and Spanish •Touch, swipe and tilt functionality to feed the dinosaurs, explore dinosaur x-rays and learn over 160 dinosaur facts •Dinosaur index with sorting and classification filters to build science inquiry skills •Dinosaur Letter section where kids can spell words, build literacy skills and play with dinosaur letters •Narration by Mr. Conductor Dinosaur Train A to Z is based on the PBS KIDS series Dinosaur Train, produced by The Jim Henson Company. Targeting kids ages 3-6, the app is designed to extend the series’ science curriculum, helping kids to develop inquiry skills, core science knowledge and spark enthusiasm in life science, natural science and paleontology. For more learning adventures with Dinosaur Train, visit http://www.pbskids.org/dinosaurtrain . For more apps from PBS KIDS, visit http://to.pbs.org/kidsapps . About PBS KIDS Dinosaur Train A to Z is part of PBS KIDS’ ongoing commitment to helping kids build the skills they need to succeed in school and in life. PBS KIDS, the number one educational media brand for kids, offers all children the opportunity to explore new ideas and new worlds through television and digital media, as well as community-based programs. Privacy Across all media platforms, PBS KIDS is committed to creating a safe and secure environment for children and families and being transparent about what information is collected from users. To learn more about PBS KIDS’ privacy policy, visit pbskids.org/privacy.

For more Dinosaur Train and PBS KIDS apps, visit http://www.pbskids.org/apps

Animal Alphabet for Kids is a free educational app to teach ABC to kids. This app is designed for families having preschoolers (3-5 year children). Parents can install it to teach all letters in English alphabet to their kids and to enjoy together. Please note that the language of the app is English. There are 6 categories for adorable kids: Read A-Z, Learn to Write, Pattern, Find the Correct Image, Puzzle, Quiz. Read A-Z category has three subcategories: letters, phonics, animals. Children will see the little and capital letters and hear how the letters are pronounced in English. Also, there are lovely animals with their pretty images and sounds, along with this there will an human voice mentioning the initial letter of animal names. Children and even toddlers will enjoy so much and learn animals and letters at the same time. There are various animals like deer, camel, elephant, iguana. Kids can learn the shapes of the letters by tracing the letters or fill the letter shapes. Kids learn not only how to write and read the letters but also to read and write some basic words by dragging and dropping the letters to form a word. There are many amusing games, puzzles and quizzes for preschool education. They will find the object starting with the letter, connect the dots to see funny images. Children will learn the letters and words before going to school. Features: - Human voice for Alphabets to teach how the letters are pronounced in English - Image of each letters with capital and little ones - Pretty images and real sounds of the Animals - Amusing games for letter recognition - Pre-school educational content

Förarintyg är en heltäckande utbildningsapplikation för blivande fritidsskeppare som ska ta förarintyg och för mer erfarna båtägare och seglingsentusiaster som vill friska upp sina kunskaper inför båtsäsongen. Alla frågor, svar och förklaringar och all teori i appen bygger på den senaste kurslitteraturen och täcker in alla ämnen som tas upp i den. Förarintyg innehåller 400 teorifrågor som påminner om frågorna på det riktiga provet samt 60 sjökortsfrågor*. För att uppmuntra djupinlärning så har två tredjedelar av frågorna en tillhörande förklaringsruta som ger mer detaljerad information på ämnet eller förklarar varför rätt svar är rätt och varför fel svar är fel. INNEHÅLL • 400 teorifrågor och 60 sjökortsfrågor • Över 300 utförliga förklaringar till frågorna • Lättläst sammanfattning av teorin • Lista med navigations- och båttermer • Statistik för både teori- och sjökortsprovet • Detaljerad, överskådlig och pedagogisk rättning med förklaringar • Automatisk sparfunktion som ger dig möjlighet att återuppta påbörjade prov • Slumpad placering på alla svarsalternativ • Inbyggd funktion för att utmana vänner via mail • Kompakt universaldesign anpassad för de flesta skärmstorlekar • Intuitivt, vackert och högupplöst gränssnitt FEEDBACK Kontakta oss på kontakt@boboshi.se om du har synpunkter på innehållet eller idéer om hur vi kan förbättra applikationen. Vi uppskattar verkligen all feedback vi kan få! OM INTYGET Förarintyg för fritidsbåt (kallas även skärgårdsskepparexamen, förarbevis och båtkörkort) är en nautisk icke professionell examen i bland annat navigation och säkerhet till sjöss som regleras av Nämnden för båtlivsutbildning (NFB). Intyget ger ingen särskild behörighet men krävs oftast av den som ska hyra båt, intyget kan dessutom ge en lägre försäkringspremie. Förarintyg är även en förutsättning för att kunna ta kustskepparintyg. *För att besvara sjökortsfrågorna krävs övningssjökorten 616 och 6163. De finns att köpa online och i välsorterade båtbutiker. Featured on batliv.se, feber.se, pcforalla.idg.se and in the newspapers, we Boaters and Practical Båtägande. Driver's certificate is a comprehensive educational app for budding recreational boaters to take driver's certificate and for more experienced boaters and boating enthusiasts who want to brush up their skills before the boating season. Any questions, answers and explanations and all the theory in the app based on recent literature and covers all the topics covered in it. Driver's certificate contains 400 questions on theory reminiscent of the questions on the real exam and 60 charts questions *. To encourage deep learning, two thirds of the questions an accompanying explanation box that provides more detailed information on the substance or explain why the right answer is right and why wrong answers are wrong. CONTENT • 400 theoretical questions and 60 charts questions • Over 300 detailed explanations to questions • Easy to read summary of the theory • List of navigation and BOAT • Statistics of both theory and charts sample • Detailed, foreseeable and pedagogical correction with explanations • Automatic saving feature that allows you to resume started trial • Random placement on all possible answers • Built-in feature to challenge friends via email • Compact universal design to fit most screen sizes • Intuitive, nice and high resolution interface FEEDBACK Contact us at kontakt@boboshi.se if you have comments on the content or ideas on how we can improve the application. We really appreciate all the feedback we can get! If the certificate Driver's certificate for recreational boating (also called archipelago Skipper, licenses and boating license) is a nautical non professional degree in including navigation and safety at sea governed by the Board of boating education (NFB). The certificate gives no specific entry requirements but is usually required of the person who will rent a boat, the certificate may also provide a lower insurance premium. Drivers certificate is also a prerequisite for taking the coastal ship master. * In order to answer the questions the chart takes practice charts 616 and 6163rd They are available online and in the well-stocked Detailing.

description: The DoD Safe Helpline app gives members of the military community access to resources and tools to help manage the short- and long-term effects of sexual assault. The app helps you create a plan that is right for you, provides exercises that aid in reducing stress, and tools to help you transition to civilian life. You can even store your customized plans and exercises to supplement ongoing therapy. The app provides support in a number of ways: Self-care and ongoing support- Users can supplement on-going therapy by identifying trends and quickly accessing self-care exercises to help with a difficult moment. Users can also directly access the Safe HelpRoom to securely chat with other survivors. Information and Resources - Users can access information within the app to learn more about sexual assault, such as what to do if someone they know has been assaulted, the effects of sexual assault, and how to reduce their risks. In addition, users can access the full Safe Helpline database of military and civilian resources. Crisis Support - Users can immediately access Safe Helpline’s Telephone and Online Helplines for crisis intervention support and information to help them decide their next steps. To learn more about Safe Helpline, visit www.SafeHelpline.org.
release_text: Added access to the Safe HelpRoom. Safe HelpRoom is a place for survivors to chat with and support each other online. The HelpRoom is safe, moderated, and open 24/7.

-It will be impossible for anyone to guess whether the my phone is recording. You can be a hidden recording. -Free version includes all functions of the paid version, except for a 70 minute limitation of recording time. Purchase paid version if you like it after a trial of the free version. -Recording widget Secret recording is available by using up to 576 user settings with a combination of various selections of on and off widgets, such as transparent, camera, gallery, folder, etc. The transparent widget can make only ON transparent, only OFF transparent, or both ON and OFF transparent, and can hide recording status by hiding or showing a widget as a combination such as camera, gallery, folder, etc. One of the biggest advantages of the SC recorder is that users can freely do a secrete recording by changing widget icons. - Custom widget icon Widget icon that you have created can be used. -Notification icons at the top, message The secret recording is available by changing 20 notification icons such as receiving phone calls, warning, download, etc. which are transparent and system support icons, and by changing notification start, notification title, notification message under setting. You can see the current recording time on the notification bar without running the apps showing recording time instead of notification title if you check “Show Recording Time” under setting. -Recording is available under standby mode. Once recording has started using a widget or an app, continuous recording is possible even though the screen is turned off or the app doesn’t run unless users stop recording, or the recorder is turned off by a dead battery. -The password to the list The recording list can only be shown by typing the password and the recording files can be hidden due to not being searched in other media apps if you check “Using Password” after setting the password under setting. (The app which has a folder search function can not be applied) -Extra storage This is storage which is left for the other apps’ smooth usage and users can control the space from 100MB to 1GB. The files that are not registered for permanent storage start to be automatically deleted if a designated capacity is exceeded. -Permanent storage of recording files A menu is presented when users click recording files on the list and its’ icon is shown in red. It can prevent automatic delete when extra space is exceeded. Check on this if it is an important file. -Timer recording Users don’t have to worry about recording time since the recording is automatically terminated when the time specified by the user is done. -Notepad. A menu is presented when the recording file is clicked on the list and the extra explanation and contents about the recording file can be recorded. Icon of recorded file changed to pencil shape indicating that it is recorded. Since the recording file name can be modified at the same time, use the file name as a title of the contents on notepad. - Alarm recording Take advantage of the time recorder voice timer recorder. When the specified time is reached, voice recording will begin. - SMS remote audio recording SMS can be used as a remote recorder. You can SMS to start and stop audio recording. - Send files and send multiple files To take advantage of cloud storage space your PC, phone files can be interlocked. Your phone may exceed the storage capacity limit. - Folder Manager Support SD card storage. -Inconvenience, suggestions, and errors We will try our best to reflect your opinions on update if you leave any inconvenience, suggestions, and errors on developers’ email( sominu75@gmail.com ) or blog ( http://screcorder.com ). -SC recorder is a specialized app in a secret recording and surveillance recording, spy recording.

Mit Codecheck.info erfährst du sofort, was tatsächlich in deinem Produkt steckt. Scanne dazu einfach den Barcode und Codecheck.info verrät dir kritische Inhaltsstoffe. Codecheck.info ✓ liest den Barcode und QR-Code von über 22 Millionen Artikeln ✓ gibt dir unabhängige Expertenbewertungen und Angaben zu Inhaltsstoffen ✓ kennzeichnet Nährwerte und Inhaltsstoffe in den Ampelfarben ✓ macht den Produkt- und Preisvergleich ✓ warnt vor kritischen Inhalten ✓ schützt mit Allergie-Warnungen Der Barcode verrät dir alles, was du über ein Produkt wissen musst. description: Sick of complicate game? Lets try out something simple game to cheer up your day. Don’t miss out on our new games Fluffy Eliminator ! After each and every level you will have to drain more brain .Use lesser moves to complete the level to earn more points. HASENAT QURAN RESEARCH APPLICATION - ENGLISH (22 MB) Fully functional, no advertisement, fully free. Please e-mail your questions to hasenatnet@yahoo.com ATTENTION: Minimum 1 GHz processor and 1 GB RAM is needed for the program to function properly. You may encounter with error messages while operating the program in devices below these specifications. FEATURES OF THE PROGRAM: *Arabic calligraphy with high definition, *Advanced Qur’an index, *Displaying results from 10 different translations at the same time. Also ability to search and display in English and other language translations after their files are downloaded. *Advanced search in Arabic and English, *Searching by surah name (or surah number) and verse number, *Quran listening (3 different reciters) *Advanced notebook, *Advanced favorite adding features. Categorized listing of favorites. Defining and organizing main folders and sub folders. *Selecting word on a page and forwarding it directly for searching, *Search history features, *Searching in the result screen, *TABBED STRUCTURE allowing roaming through the functions, *Option to share a verse via SMS and mail, *Arabic text displaying features by choosing a device font (digital) (this feature is available on devices with Android 4 and above), *Preview screen. With this feature you may display only the desired/suitable verses after checking the boxes of verses displayed as a result of a search query. *Advanced “Settings” menu allowing to personalize the program, *And many other features.

Langenscheidt dictionaries - dictionaries, phrasebooks and reference products for school, home, office, and travel from the most internationally renowned and leading publishers in the fields of Languages. -------------- Langenscheidt Professional-Wörterbuch Englisch • Around 800,000 headwords, expressions and translations • Translates from and into German (German<->English) • Up-to-date vocabulary from all general language style levels  • Extensive specialist terminology from all major fields • Additional information: examples of use, indicators showing distinctions between various meanings, grammar explanations •  A comprehensive reference work for professional translations at the workplace, for teachers  and students -------------- The new full text search feature allows you to look up words more efficiently. • Enter a query into the input field and Langenscheidt will automatically build a list of entries containing your query, increasing the probability of finding the right definition. • Find precise word translations containing a number of usage examples. • Because full text search supports the Morphology module and ‘Did you mean…?’ function, users can be sure that virtually all search queries can be found regardless of misspelling or grammatical word form. • Additionally, full text search displays search results (dictionary entries) in both language directions at once without the need to switch directions manually. Convenient search methods allow you to find any word in a number of different ways. ∙ General search ∙ New! Full Text Search ∙ New! Search for anagrams (e.g. bat-tab) ∙ New! Search within entries to narrow down and quickly navigate larger entries ∙ Wildcard search to find the word even if you don’t know its exact spelling ∙ Similar words search in case of misspelling Translate and input features • Three integrated input methods make dictionary use more convenient than ever. Enter the word in your own handwriting with Paragon’s PenReader handwriting recognition technology, search by voice using Google Voice recognition service or take a picture of the text and translate it with Google Goggles. • Easy copy-and-paste functions allow unknown words or phrases to be copied from an active application like the web browser or email to the clipboard, and automatically translated by switching back to Langenscheidt. • NEW! Translate unknown words or phrases from any application like the web browser or email using the Share button. The feature allows you to send copied text to a dictionary directly and get translation in one click! (Available for OS 4.0 and higher). • Morphology module helps to translate words in any grammatical form (for English, French, Spanish and Russian languages). Learning Features • NEW! Full linguistic information – with declension and conjugation tables – is included, making the Langenscheidt-App a must-have for any language scholar (for English, French, Spanish and Russian languages)! • Audio pronunciations recorded by native speakers. • Word of the day widget. • Integrate dictionary with the Flash Cards application and quiz yourself with words you have added from the dictionary. Interface Features • NEW! Improved interface design with easy-to-access navigation and search field makes dictionary use simple. • NEW! Lightning-fast new engine allows dictionary entries to open as soon as you click with no delays. • NEW! Favorites. • Dictionary installation on SD card. • Enlarge or reduce font size for your comfort. • Search History feature shows the last 100 words looked up. • No Internet connection required. ---------- About Langenscheidt Publishing Group The Langenscheidt Publishing Group is best known for its area of core competence: dictionaries and language learning material in various formats and on diverse media.

Wi-Fi File Transfer is the instant - easiest and quickest file sharing application, supporting multiple files sharing with multiple devices simultaneously. Connect your devices at a glance and share your files at extra high speeds. Say “goodbye” to complicated Wi-Fi network settings and connections, in order to share your files. All you need, is to connect your devices to the same Wi-Fi network. You can create your own Wi-Fi hotspot on your device and have others connected to it, or connect your device to an already existing network, or use a Wi-Fi direct connection! Guide: • Connect two or more devices to the same WiFi network. • Once the devices are discovered send files to one or multiple devices. • The received files are stored in the WiFiFileTransfer folder of the sdcard. Wi-Fi File Transfer uses the Samsung Chord technology. tags: WiFi, Wi-Fi, file, share, transfer, exchange, beam, WiFi direct

description: The #1 FREE iPhone and iPad virtual world "Story" series returns with Bakery Story! Design your own dream bakery to show off to your friends. Don't forget to make sure your customers are happy and well-fed by choosing stunning decoration and tasty new pastries! New content will be released EVERY WEEK so the game continually gets even better! - Design and build a unique bakery with stunning variety and creativity. - Customize and choose a top-class menu to suit your tastes. - Showcase your bakery and earn extra-special tips from friends. - Invite your Facebook friends to be your neighbors. - Exchange secret recipes with your friends. - Simple and easy-to-use tap interface. - FREE updates with new pastries, decorations, themes and more EVERY WEEK! - It's FREE! PLEASE NOTE: - This is an online game only. Please note that BAKERY STORY™ is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money. To delete this feature, on your device go to Settings Menu -> General -> Restrictions option. You can then simply turn off In-App Purchases under "Allowed Content". In addition, BAKERY STORY™ may link to social media services, such as Facebook, and Storm8 will have access to your information through such services. Storm8 Studios is the #1 Mobile Social Game Developer on Android. Use of this application is governed by the Storm8 Studios Terms of Service. Collection and use of data are subject to Storm8 Studios Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at http://www.storm8-studios.com/terms/ and http://www.storm8-studios.com/privacy/ Follow Storm8 www.storm8-studios.com facebook.com/storm8 twitter.com/storm8

description: アプリダウンロード数1,100万突破!! 「LINE マンガ連載」では アニメ化・映画化の最新話題作や、 LINEオリジナル作品など、 200作品以上の連載マンガを毎日“無料”更新 【主な連載作品】 ・ワールドトリガー（集英社） ・ヤング ブラック･ジャック（秋田書店） ・ピース オブ ケイク（祥伝社） ・CITY HUNTER（ノース･スターズ･ピクチャーズ） など、アニメ化・映画化の話題作も続々登場 【LINEマンガ限定配信】 ・マリーミー！ ・怪ダンシ！ ・ハードボイルド園児 宇宙くん ・アーチェリーボーイ など、LINEオリジナルはフルカラー&全話無料公開中 ＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿＿ LINE マンガは「LINE」の公式電子マンガサービスです。 無料でお楽しみいただける連載マンガに加え、約9万冊のマンガ・ライトノベルを購入して読むことができます。 【LINE マンガの特徴】 ◆連載マンガが無料で読める! 週刊少年ジャンプ、週刊少年サンデーなどに連載中の人気マンガをはじめ、毎週更新される200タイトル以上の話題作品を無料で読むことができます。 ◆約9万冊のマンガが買える! 豊富な立ち読みに加え、期間限定で毎週1巻〜複数巻をまるごと無料で試し読みできるキャンペーンを実施中！話題作や人気作品を毎週じっくり試し読みできます！ ◆友だちに共有してお得にマンガをGET！ 好きな本をLINEのタイムラインに投稿したり、友だちへトークシェアするとマンガやライトノベルをお得に購入できます！ ◆LINEスタンプがGETできる！ 対象シリーズのマンガを購入すると、LINEで使えるLINE マンガ限定スタンプが手に入ります。 スタンプ付きマンガ一部抜粋 ・宇宙兄弟（講談社） ・進撃の巨人（講談社） ・私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!（スクウェア・エニックス） ・鋼の錬金術師（スクウェア・エニックス） ・アオハライド（集英社） ・弱虫ペダル（秋田書店） ※今後順次、追加予定です。 【主なサービス内容】 ・連載 毎日更新される連載マンガが無料でお楽しみいただけます。 ・ストア 約9万冊のマンガやライトノベルを購入することができます。 ・購入した本 同じLINEアカウントでログインをすれば、機種変更などを行っても購入した本を引き継いでご利用いただけます。 スマートフォンで購入したマンガをタブレットで読むことができます。 ※最大3台まで同じLINEアカウントでログインしてご利用いただけます。 また、ブラウザ版の LINE マンガ ( https://manga.line.me/ ) では購入した本をPCの大画面で閲覧することもできます。 【推奨環境】 Android OS4.0以上 ※LINE マンガのご利用には、LINEアカウントが必要です。
release_text: ▼4.4.1 - 特定の操作でクラッシュするバグの修正を行いました - 細かいデザインの改善を行いました ▼4.4.0 - 細かいデザインの改善を行いました - 軽微なバグの修正を行いました - アプリ内から最新バージョンを確認できるようになりました ▼4.2.0 - ユーザーアイコンを登録できるようになりました - コメントを複数回投稿できるようになりました - 投稿の履歴表示機能を追加しました - ストアランキングや検索でキャンペーン中の本が分かるようになりました ▼4.1.0 - ストアランキング表示の改善を行いました - コメント・レビューの通報機能を追加しました - インディーズ作家の関連情報表示を追加しました ※LINEに登録しているメールアドレスとパスワードを入力してください。 ※異なるOSの端末にアカウントを同期する場合、購入したマンガの同期は可能ですが、コイン残高は同期できません。

description: The most robust, full featured, and AD FREE Tip Calculator on the Play Store! You won't find another tip calculator with this many features, looks this good, and is as simple and intuitive as Tip Me. Ad free and requires no permissions! Features: -Calculates in real time -Shake device to reset (turn on/off via menu) -Split bill evenly between any number of people or separately adjust each person's bill according what they ordered. -Built-in calculator to easily determine each person's bill -Coupon feature to determine tip on original amount. -Specify your own custom tip percent(set default in menu) -Rounding options (up/down/auto) -Calculate pre and post tax -move to SD -Customize the look by choosing from four available fonts
release_text: - Fixed divide, multiply, and minus button calculations within the calculator feature

description: The Domain Finder allows you to quickly check the state of a domain with many different top level domains. Currently, it supports over 70 top level domains! For every domain, detailed information can be displayed. As the top level domains are handled on the server side, there is no need to update the App itself when changes occure. New top level domains can be added on the fly this way.

Our designers have a vintage masterpiece for your smartphone: CUTE VINTAGE KEYBOARD! DOWNLOAD Cute Vintage Keyboard now and enjoy the papyrus like design on your display! - To install, just follow the 3 steps: open after downloading, press "Set as Active Theme" and select the theme from the following page! - The amazing HD screenshots we added will show you just how great this theme will look on your phone keyboard! - This theme uses GO Keyboard, so if you do not have it installed, you will be redirected to a download page! - The menus for this theme come with 48 different language translations! Take the time to RATE and COMMENT after you install, your opinion will help us improve our work! And do not hesitate to contact us at themesonlyex@gmail.com with any suggestions or questions you have! This theme uses a free font which can be found at: http://www.1001fonts.com/new-spirit-font.html and graphic elements from http://www.brusheezy.com/brushes/47941-15-ink-droplet-brushes To support further development of high quality themes, this app may show some ads that do not interfere with the app's functionality.

description: One of the most addictive game - Sheep Launcher Plus! is finally available on Android! Push the big red button to launch a sheep or his friends. Keep tapping him as fast as you can to boost him higher. See if you have what it takes to go beyond our Solar System and discover what's really out there. It is a huge universe!!

지원 해상도 1280X720(소프트키 미지원), 1280X768, 1280X800, 1920X1080(소프트키 지원), 2560X1440(소프트키 지원) 나머지 해상도에 대한 작업은 되어 있지 않아 오류가 발생할수 있습니다. 반지다이어리 업그레이드! 달력 테마, 다이어리 스킨, D-day, 시간표, 위젯이 추가됐어요. 귀염 깜찍 반지 다이어리! 다양한 달력 테마와 다이어리 스킨으로 나만의 비밀일기를 꾸밀 수 있어요. 귀여운 반지 스티커로 더 특별하게 꾸며요! [월간 달력] 다이어리, 일정을 한눈에 볼 수 있는 달력! 귀여운 반지 스티커로 꾸며보세요. [다이어리] 마음에 드는 다이어리 스킨을 선택하고, 글과 사진으로 오늘의 다이어리를 써봐요. [D-day] D-day, 기념일을 반지와 함께 관리해보세요. [시간표] 학교생활에 유용한 시간표 기능이 추가되었어요. [환경설정] 달력 테마와 다이어리 스킨을 내 마음대로 바꿔봐요. [비밀번호] 쉿, 비밀이야! 소중한 다이어리의 비밀번호를 설정할 수 있어요. [백업&복원] 핸드폰이 바뀌어도 내 다이어리를 함께 가져갈 수 있어요. [위젯] 달력,시간표를 바탕화면에서 확인 할 수 있어요. description: Math BINGO is a free educational Math Bingo Addition, Subtraction, Multiplication or Division Game For Kids and children to practice maths on your phone/tablet. Choose from addition, subtraction, multiplication or division BINGO, then select a level of difficulty. Designed especially for preschool kids, kindergarten kids, 1st grade, 2nd grade etc For issues/support contact us at support@kidsworldapps.com

Tractor Pulling is the first 3D tractor pulling game for the Android OS, with over 500 events and 20+ tractors! Uses OpenGL ES and jPCT for 3D Graphics and high quality sound effects to place you directly in the seat of the worlds most powerful tractors. NO ADS and NO PERMISSIONS! Truck Pulling, coming soon as separate game: from Stock to Pro to Super, Two and Four Wheeled, Pro and Super Semis! Features: Currently 20 tractors over 5 classes: Antique, Super Farm, Super Stock, Limited Modified, and Unlimited Modified. Includes tractors all the way from a Farmall M to a John Deere 4020 to Jet Turbines to SIX V8 engines! For each class, travel across 5 different regions participating in County, State, Regional, National, and Grand National Events! That's over 500 events! Upgrade your tractor with the prize winnings, earning more points, eventually becoming the Grand National champion! Six different camera angles: driver's seat, behind, front-side angle, grand-stands, sled driver, and 300ft mark. Each pull event has different track conditions: adjust your tire pressure, weights, and gearing to get the most pulling power. Based on a realistic physics engine, it's like watching a real tractor pull! View a fully detailed graph/plot of RPM, Boost, Acceleration, Velocity, and Distance of the finished pull. Game Tips: -Read the Help and Hints spread around the different screens if you are unsure what to do. -Click on the camera during a pull (top right) to change views. Zoom in and out with the +-. -Hold done the throttle button until full RPM's are reached and the tractor begins to move. -Steer with the brakes, tapping works best, only touch one brake at a time! -Pulling in a higher level of competition than what your tractor can handle will not be easy. Make sure to upgrade! -Earning money from the start can be slow, but choose upgrades wisely and the better you get the easier it is to earn money.
Want to send sweet bouquet in Israel? Install our app and send gifts and sweet bouquet I Israel, same day delivery.

Compass & Widget - 2 in 1. Now you get two widgets:2x2 & 4x4. Click the widget and get the fullscreen mode, where you can see: - direction to magnetic North - magnetometer bar(use it as a metal detector) - glass effect on the compass and where you may: - change between the metal detector and the direction by clicking on them or through the settings(click "back" for closing settings) - enable/disable autorotation - enable/disable accelerometer https://www.facebook.com/CompassWidget

AOSP WiFi Keyboard ================== This is the standard Jelly Bean AOSP Keyboard with a few modifications: - Merge with Ivan Volosyuk's WiFi Keyboard - German is now QWERTY instead of QWERTZ - Both German and Portuguese and English support the same set of international keys (now one can type in any of these three languages in any of the keyboard layouts, event hough the dictionary won't help) - Russina Phonetic Keyboard The WiFi part means that you can connect your PC's browser to your phone and use your PC's keyboard to type on your fine. It is awesome for developers to test their apps and for people who want to type on whatsapp even faster :) Works on any browser, no plugins nor software must be installed on the PC. This app is GPLv2 Open Source. https://github.com/marcosdiez/aosp-morelang-ime Thanks to Yuvi Panda, https://github.com/yuvipanda and Ivan Volosyuk, http://code.google.com/p/wifikeyboard/ Merge done by Marcos Diez (marcos AT unitron DOT com DOT br)

An Essential item for pixel art lovers. Pixel Artist is a simple pixel paint application enabling you to post your works to the in-app gallery. ♥ Sending your works by mail or Twitter, communicate with your friends♪ ♥ Posting your works to the gallery needs non specific account, interact with friends through giving & receiving likes! ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Features ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– ♥ Toolbar - Adjust colors from the color pallet or color picker selected 20 / 32 / 64 / 128 pixel size. - Switch Brush / Spuit / Fill - Suck up a color pn the canvas - Undo - Redo ※Until 50 times - Hidden or appear grid ♥ Sub Menu - Clear canvas - Save to external storage -Library If your external storage is available, you can save and reload the image on working. It is possible to re-edit the picture that you saved in the storage. - Send file attachments - Post to Gallery(Entry a tag, a title and a pseudonym) ※Needless acquiring a specific ID ♥ Controls - Flick with 2 fingers to move the canvas - Pinch in or out to zoom the canvas(Max 4000%, Min 50%) - Double tap to toggle default and your preferred zoom level ♥ Gallery - Select from 2 app galleries GO!GO!PAINT / Pixel Artist - Search with a comment, a pen name and a tag - Save to external storage as a PNG image - Popularity Vote ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Notes ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– ♥ This application doesn't support multitasking. ♥ Your work posted to the gallery will be released after checking. ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Support ––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––– Feedbacks from everyone is essential to make the application more excellent in the future. Please let me receive your opinion and request at the customers review.

Dominoes is a number game, minimum two players are required to start game, in this version mobile plays against you. Game Rules: Game chain end dots sum is divided by 4 if remainder is 0, score ( sum of chain end dots ) is credited. Whoever obtains 200 points first wins the game. If both player score is greater than 200 points the highest score wins the game. One game consists of many hands, the player whose hand chip sum is minimum wins the hand; if both players hand chip sum is 0; hand is declared DRAW. * Score leader board, submit score and show your achievement to other players globally. * Multiple chips designs. * Tips and tricks feature – share your gaming experience with other players. *SUPPORT* For suggestions, feature request, score restore, and so on, contact support@tiddagames.com .
release_text: * Updated sdk for better reliability and performance of the game * Fixed force close issue on Android 4.0.3 devices

description: Indeed, all praise and thanks are due to Allah. We praise Him, seek His help and His forgiveness. The Messenger of Allah used to recite Dua e Qunoot during Salat al-Fajr, Witr and sometimes during other prayers throughout the year.  This app helps you read the text of the supplication as well as facilitates you in listening to the Dua e Qunoot. It also contains English Translation and Transliteration. It has been narrated in Abu Dawud that the Messenger of Allah used to recite al-Qunoot whenever a major difficulty or disaster befell the Muslims. Why not follow this Sunnah of our beloved Prophet and learn the Dua (Supplication). More at: http://www.essatechpoint.com/2013/02/dua-e-qunoot.html Your comments and suggestions are most welcomed in review section below. ***I sincerely thank all my users for liking the app. Your appreciation makes us move forward always. May Allah help us all. Jazakallah. Peace
release_text: Version 2.1 ---------------------- text size fix Version 1.4 ------------------------ Minor bugs fixation and tweaks Improved Arabic text on more devices Version 1.5 ------------------------ function to repeat dua in a loop increase or decrease font size as required better view for large tablets

description: Collect your units, create your army, deploy your legions and work your strategy to battle the opponents pieces and capture their castle! Armies of Zatikon combines trading card collectibility, dynamics and variety to Chess board strategy! Rush your enemy with speedy Rangers combined with the all-powerful Dragon and steadfast Pikemen, or slowly advance with the mighty Necromancer and the Zombies and Skeleton Warriors he conjures! Back him up with any number of units from Angels, Soldiers, Knights and Martyrs to Demons, Barbarians, Fire Archers, and Heretics! With over 100 unique pieces, no game is ever the same, whether in single player against the AI computer, online 2 vs 2, online player vs player constructed, or even in joining a friend to play together vs the computer! Use powerful "relic" cards/pieces to add abilities to your units, to your teammates pieces, or even to trade control of pieces with them! Random mode let's you play with pieces you haven't yet collected, against the computer, against a friend, or with them! With so many play modes, Armies of Zatikon always has a new fun strategy awaiting you. Check out these amazing features: - Free to Play! - Single player mode vs the Computer AI- win gold! - Online player vs player: Multiplayer matchmaking - Online 2 player vs 2 player: Join a friend and form a double sized army to take on another 2 player team! - Online Cooperative Mode: Join a friend to combine armies and play against the Computer AI together. - Random Mode Play: Player vs Player (PVP) with random generated armies, single player vs the computer, or with a friend vs the computer. - General Chat as Well as In-Game Chat - "Retro" style art and animations - "Turn-based Strategy" combining trading card game dynamics with the 3 phases of Chess: Opening, Mid -game, End game- Capture the Castle! - Easy to learn, hard to master! Unlimited strategies and tactics! - Collect and Create your own armies: Carefully choose your pieces for your custom strategy, and save it. Up to 10 armies can be saved at a time! - The first game play based on Magic the Gathering (MTG) combined with Chess! - Over 100 unique units in categories like Dark Mages, Light Mages, Siege, Nature, Soldiers, Commanders, Archers, Clergy, Cultists, Horsemen, and Wyrms! - Based on a historical medieval period, Armies of Zatikon is a fantasy game unlike any other, with a feel of the forces of good and evil clashing in battle!! - Earn free units as you win matches and progress against the computer or online foes. Sell units back and save towards others like the Dracolich or Dragon!!! What people are saying about Zatikon: "Extremely fun....pretty much an endless combination of ways to both compose your armies as well as using them in the game." - Game Tunnel "Zatikon is a highly replayable and addictive game that rewards thoughtful play." - Steve Blanch - Bytten "An excellent mixture of elements of turn-based strategy and Chess." - Baixaki (Portuguese) "A superb turn-based strategy title...tons of extremely creative characters with interesting special abilities." - Jay Is Games "If you like strategy/war type games you should check out Zatikon" - "Casual gamer chick" Originally created by Chronic Logic Games in 2001 and now brought to mobile by Triceratapps Publishing 13 years later, "Armies of Zatikon", originally just "Zatikon", was built when Magic the Gathering collectible trading card game was at its height. Using retro style graphics and turn-based gameplay formed on the 3 chess game phases: "The opening, The Middle Game, and "The End Game", Zatikon was a PC and Mac MMO hit for Chess players, Magic fans, Trading Card Game (TCG) and Collectible Card Game (CCG) players, and even Role Playing Game (RPG) fans alike! Where Strategy meets Fantasy, and Chess meets Cards is where Armies of Zatikon meets Mobile!

Have a sweet-tooth and a flair for cakes? Cake Maker is just what you need! Bake your favorite cakes with Stella. Baking a cake was never this easy. Decorate with toppings and layer with cream; make the yummy cake of your dreams! Easy to bake cakes for every event- make the occasion more special by baking a cake yourself with your Cake Maker! From Wedding to Christmas to Birthday- Show your loved ones the color of your affection by beautifully decorated cakes and let them taste the sweetness of your love by your freshly baked sweet delicious cakes. Pave your way to the best cake in town with the help of the numerous ingredients and decorations that your Cake Maker offers. From candles to toys to sprinkles- Name it and we have it! Score of flavored syrups to make you fall in love with your home-made cakes! Even kids can make a cake whenever they want, however they want- with their own hands. From baking cupcakes to cakes, we provide you with the ultimate satisfaction of baking the yummiest delicacies. Cake Maker is all that you require to make your cake-baking super fun. Share with your friends and increase the love. Send snap shots of your creations to the ones you want to tease and make their mouth water! Happy baking! Features: ✔ Thousands of possible combinations for making your very own cakes. ✔ Several unique decoration categories, each with 10+ items – all unlocked from the very start. ✔ Completely free – no strings attached. ✔ You can save your created cakes and show it to your friends and family. ✔ Colorful, vibrant visuals. ABOUT ICAW A growing network for Game lovers since 2013 with over 30 Million downloads. ICAW has been trying to provide the best quality virtual adventure to the users in different categories i.e. Casual, Role playing, Arcade, Family and Educational. Our struggle continues to meet the satisfaction of our loyal users by introducing our games in more categories in their super favorite art styles!! Hit the search button and type ICAW on Google Play and discover more apps. Visit us: http://www.icawgames.com/ Like us: https://www.facebook.com/icawgames Watch us: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKts4gtHzaDKDp9q3taEsiA Contact us: Your feedback is very important!! Contact us 24/7 at feedback.icaw@gmail.com . description: How long can you survive on the road full of zombies? "Crazy Road and Zombie" is a driving survival game wherein you need to run as long as you can on the road full of zombies with your truck. Drive your truck to steer away from obstacles. Smash zombies to kill them and collect coins. You can buy upgrades between levels if you have earned enough coins to purchase. There will be solid materials that obstruct the way; don’t hit them or the wall so as to maintain the trucks functionality. Fully damaged vehicle can end the game immediately. Game features: Upgrade your truck with multiple power-ups! Realistic physics and intuitive game control! Endless mode! Free without any In-App Purchases!

When it comes to a royal pet, it is important that it looks its best at all times! With the Royal Pets Grooming Salon caring game you can easily groom beautiful and cute animals which include a pet dog, cat, rabbit, squirrel, tiger, pig, elephant, horse, and dinosaur! With this free caring game you can easily choose the royal pet you want to make pretty and start by removing all the mud from their body before you wash, rinse, and dry them with a cloth. Next you can blow dry them and brush their hair in your very own salon! Once the cleaning is done you can then move onto brushing your royal pet's teeth for that pearly smile! You can also clip their claws, feed them, and vaccinate them before getting them ready for their big debut out in public. With so many different fun caring game accessories to choose from, you can mix and match the perfect outfit that is fit for royalty. So if you like to play free games and love animals, be part of royalty with this fanstastic pet game! Features: CHOOSE your royal pet from a cat, dog, rabbit, squirrel, tiger, pig, elephant, horse, and dinosaur! REMOVE all the mud from your royal pet using the spatula! WASH, scrub, rinse, dry, blow dry, and brush your pet so they are clean and tidy looking! BRUSH your pet's teeth to give them a lovely white pearly smile! CLIP their claws to make them neat and shorter so they can't scratch anyone! FEED your hungry royal pet so their tummy is nice and full for happiness! GIVE your pet their vaccination to help protect them from any unwanted illnesses! GIVE your pet some love and scratch them where their relaxing spot is! DECORATE and accessorize your royal pet by dressing them in a hat, glasses, collar, tie, and shoes!

V3.1 PLEASE NOTE IMPORTANT ******** Please do a clean reinstall (uninstall and install again) instead of updating the app directly or else the new features wont work!***** **QuickReply is only for Sony SmartWatch 2** *** 10 editable Predefined Replies added*** *** SMS integration added *** *** Follow the XDA thread for updates and discussions*** http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2700771 "Quick Reply for SmartWatch 2" enables to receive Whatsapp and SMS alerts, and send quick replies from your connected Sony Smart Watch 2 either by typing custom messages or by using predefined message templates. (Your phone must be rooted with latest BusyBox installed ) Steps: 1. Grant Root access forever 2. Enable "Quick Reply for SmartWatch 2" under Accessibility Services. Disable any other Whatsapp services (reboot the phone if required) 3. Install BusyBox from PlayStore 4. Disable Whatsapp Media AutoDownload completely to avoid crashes/false notifications To reply from SW2, click the menu during any message and hit phone icon to send predefined messages or hit the keyboard button to type in the message. Predefined message instructions: Swipe left / right to choose among different message templates and hit send! Keyboard instructions : Swipe Up for upper case alphabets Swipe Down for lower case alphabets Swipe Left to delete text Swipe right for space Long press to toggle numbers and symbols Hit the >> button to send the message. Note: You need a rooted phone to read and reply to notifications! *** If you are facing crashes send us a bug report!*** Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart extension for SmartWatch 2 LiveWare extension for SmartWatch 2

description: What Is Love? Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable. Love is not about how much you say, ‘I Love You’ but how much you can prove that its true. Loving is not just looking at each other, it’s looking in the same direction. True love is rare, and it’s the only thing that gives life real meaning. Distance is just a test to see how far love can travel. We accept the love we think we deserve. Do you need a word to whisper? Do you need an inspiration to tell your lovely one? Or... are your heart is broken? You can try Love Quotes App! "Love Quotes" can make your day brighter, craft a smile on your face, or even lift you up a little. It contains quotes, poems, poetry about the relationship with your beloved one. Try "Love Quotes" now, You can enjoy all this love quotes.. * Best Love Quotes With Picture * Simple Navigation * Updated Daily

description: Brave and clever teenage detective Natalie Brooks faces a seemingly impossible task: save her grandfather, a renowned archaeologist, from kidnappers holding him ransom for an ancient treasure map. She has just 24 hours to find the map, solve the mystery of a terrible curse and unmask the truth behind a legendary ghost train! With colorful graphics, memorable characters and a thrilling storyline, Natalie Brooks: The Treasures of the Lost Kingdom is the hidden object game for which Android owners have been waiting. The stand-out release offers more than eye candy and a well told tale, though; "Natalie Brooks" game also challenges players to solve dozens of adventure-style puzzles, beat several mini-games and explore seven chapters of skillfully designed locations. With this much game packed into a single title, your device might weigh more than usual! GAME FEATURES: ◇ Seven chapters ◇ 3D characters ◇ Animated locations ◇ Tons of mini-games ◇ A charming main character

This app allows direct advertisers of Yandex.Direct to manage ad campaigns from their mobile phones. You can change bids (for all ads at once, or for specific phrases), view current information about impressions (position, CTR, CPC, moderation results and more), and start or stop campaigns. The Yandex.Direct app informs the user about events in ad campaigns. Notifications will list increases in CPC, changes in positions or a lack of funds for example. You can add to your account balance right from the app via Yandex.Money or by redistributing funds between your campaigns. The app will also show where the nearest payment point is on a map. The mobile version is only available for those using the Yandex.Direct Professional interface.

Ihre Finanzen im Blick – immer und überall mit der VR-Banking App der Volksbanken Raiffeisenbanken Sie möchten unterwegs mal eben den Kontostand abrufen, kurz die letzten Umsätze der Kreditkarte prüfen, eine dringende Überweisung erledigen, Börseninformationen einholen und mobil handeln? Kein Problem mit der VR-Banking App. Besonders praktisch: Mit der App im Flat-Design legen Sie Ihre beliebtesten Funktionen als Favoriten an. Dabei haben sie nicht nur Ihre Konten bei Volksbanken Raiffeisenbanken, sondern auch Bankverbindungen anderer Institute in der Tasche. So sind Sie noch flexibler. Selbstverständlich gelten die Sicherheitsstandards auch für Ihre hinzugefügten Banken. Ihre VR-Banking App bietet Ihnen viele nützliche Funktionen. Sie möchten Rechnungen schnell und einfach bezahlen? Mit GiroCode ist das möglich: QR-Code einscannen, TAN eingeben, fertig. Sie möchten Ihr Online-Depot und Entwicklungen an der Börse im Blick behalten? Dank der Funktion Online-Brokerage können Sie das. Schnell noch die Marktdaten abrufen und mobil handeln sind jetzt kein Problem mehr. Checken Sie Top- und Flop-Listen, Charts und Ihre persönliche Watchlist. Aber die VR-Banking App kann noch mehr. Hier sind alle Funktionen und Services im Überblick: • Persönliche Kontenübersicht • Umsatzanzeige • Überweisung / Terminüberweisung (Inland und SEPA, GiroCode) • Umbuchung • Kreditkartenumsätze • Verwaltung von Daueraufträgen • Anzeigen der noch nicht abgerechneten Umsätze • Finanzmanager • Online-Finanzstatus: Anzeige Ihrer Produkte von Unternehmen der Genossenschaftlichen FinanzGruppe • Mitteilung an die Bank • Serviceaufträge an die Bank • Telefonische Weiterleitung zur Sperrhotline • Geldautomatensuche: Standortbestimmung mittels GPS • Abrufen von Online-Depots • Wertpapiere kaufen und verkaufen • Wertpapier Watchlist • Aktuelle Kurs- und Marktinformationen • Informationen und Kontaktmöglichkeit zu Ihrem persönlichen Berater Sicherheit Ihre Daten in der VR-Banking App sind ebenso optimal gesichert wie bei Ihrer browserbasierten eBanking-Anwendung von Volksbanken Raiffeisenbanken und Online-VR Profibroker-Anwendung. Sie loggen sich wie gewohnt mit Ihrem VR-NetKey oder Alias und PIN ein. Wenn Sie andere Bankkonten hinzugefügt haben, melden Sie sich mit Ihrem Masterpasswort an. Ihre Überweisungsdaten bestätigen Sie mit einer über Sm@rt-TAN plus generierten TAN. Bitte beachten Sie, dass für Ihre VR-Banking App aus Sicherheitsgründen mobileTAN nicht zugelassen ist. Das besondere Sicherheitsmerkmal der mobileTAN besteht darin, dass sie über einen zweiten Kanal, das Handy, bereitgestellt wird. Das wäre bei der App aktuell nicht gewährleistet. Auch der TÜV Rheinland bescheinigt der VR-Banking App die Wirksamkeit der Prozesse rund um die Themen Datenschutz und Datensicherheit. http://www.certipedia.com/quality_marks/0000043889?locale=de Nützliche Informationen finden Sie auch in den FAQ’s auf der Homepage der VR-Banking App: www.vr-banking-app.de Your finances - anytime, anywhere with the VR banking app of the local cooperative banks You want to go sometimes just to retrieve the account balance, just check the last turnover of the credit card, do urgent referral, obtain market information and act mobile? No problem with the VR banking app. Especially handy: With the app in flat design put your favorite functions as favorites. They not only your accounts at local cooperative banks, but also bank accounts of other institutions in the pocket. So you are more flexible. Of course, the safety standards also apply for your added banks. Your VR banking app offers many useful functions. You want to pay bills quickly and easily? With the giro code is possible: Scan QR code, enter TAN, done. You want to keep your online depot and developments in the stock market in view? Thanks to the online brokerage function you can. Quickly access the market data and trading mobile are no longer a problem. Have a look at the Top and flop lists, charts and your personal watchlist. But the VR banking app can do even more. Here are all the features and services at a glance: • Personal Account Settings • Sales ad • Transfer / Forward transfer (domestic and SEPA, Giro Code) • Transfer • Credit card transactions • Administration of standing orders • View the unbilled revenue • Financial Manager • online financial status: Display your products from companies in the cooperative financial network • notice to the bank • Service orders to the bank • Telephone forwarding to blocking hotline • ATM: Location determination using GPS • Get online repositories • securities buy and sell • Securities Watchlist • Current share price and market information • information and opportunity to contact your advisor Security Your data in the VR banking app are as secure as possible as in your browser-based eBanking application of cooperative banks and online PR professional broker application. Log in as usual with your VR NetKey or alias and PIN. When you add other bank accounts, log in with your master password. Confirm your transfer data with a generated via Sm @ rt-TAN TAN plus. Please note that your VR banking app for security mobileTAN is not allowed. The special feature of the security mobileTAN is that it is provided via a second channel, the mobile phone. That would be in the app not guaranteed to date. Also, the TÜV Rheinland certified the VR banking app the effectiveness of the processes related to issues of data protection and data security. http://www.certipedia.com/quality_marks/0000043889?locale=de Useful information can also be found in the FAQs on the website of the VR banking app: www.vr-banking-app.de

Build a Medieval Castle with step-by-step instructions. This puzzle game is really for all ages and let you feel the atmosphere of the middle ages. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. Go for the complete castle and have hours of fun in making this replication with towers, gates and strong walls. The pieces allow the children to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest children play and be surprised with the results. Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the children will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media

description: Adaptxt Keyboard is the industry leading predictive text application for smartphones, tablets and other mobile devices. Adaptxt comes loaded with amazing features and languages, what's more, it's FREE! ## Wired Magazine recommends Adaptxt as the “BEST for: The jet-setting professional. Adaptxt is designed to predict words based on your specific writing style, as well as your location and interests. This keyboard is not only context-aware, it also adapts to the app you’re using.” ## USA Today said: “This is a cool keyboard for anyone who needs to access multiple languages.” #### SUPPORT ACROSS DEVICES The same app can be installed in smartphones, tablets and phablets, so you can enjoy the Adaptxt languages and features in all your devices. If you’re new to Adaptxt, here are the features that made us famous: LOCATION-BASED SUGGESTIONS: Adaptxt makes word suggestions, corrections and predictions more relevant to your location, to help you type seamlessly wherever you go. QUICK AND FUN INPUT Adaptxt enables you to insert entire phrases, as well as individual words, making text input even faster; with a support for over 600 emojis, you don’t need to use just words in your chat messages. PERSONALIZED TYPING EXPERIENCE Enrich your text with more personalized word prediction based on the application in use, writing style and trending words, which adds relevant context to your conversations. LARGEST LANGUAGE SUPPORT Enjoy the freedom of communicating in your native language. With support for 121 languages, we offer the best and largest language coverage in the virtual keyboard space. 49 industry-specific dictionaries make Adaptxt Keyboard a preferred choice for professionals such as doctors, lawyers, business people and others across domains. SEAMLESS TYPING Accurate autocorrection will make your writing flawless; you can tap or swipe over characters (GLIDE) to type quickly and accurately; Automatic Text Replacement (ATR) and application shortcuts will help you type effortlessly. EXTENSIVE KEYBOARD CUSTOMIZATION Choice of keyboard layouts, including 12-key (phone keypad); you can create your own themes, swap keys, and modify key shapes, font styles, background pictures and much more. #### FAQ: http://www.adaptxt.com/faq For issues/feature requests, email us at support@adaptxt.com Supports: Android 3.0 & above; touch screen & hard keyboard phones. If you are an Android or iOS app developer and want to leverage the Adaptxt prediction engine, please see http://www.adaptxt.com/developers/ We take your privacy very seriously. Adaptxt does not learn your password and never collects or sends your private data to 3rd parties. ******************************** SUPPORTED LANGUAGES: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Assamese Azerbaijani Banglish Basque Belarusian Bengali Bhojpuri Bodo Bosnian (Cyrillic) Bosnian (Latin) Bulgarian Catalan Croatian Czech Danish Dogri Dutch English (Australia) English (India) English (UK) English (US) Estonian Filipino Finnish French (Belgium) French (Canada) French (France) French (Switzerland) Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Hausa Hawaiian Hebrew Hindi Hinglish Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Javanese Kanglish Kannada Kashmiri Kazakh Konkani Korean Kurdish (Sorani) Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Maithili Malay Malayalam Manglish Manipuri Manx Maori Marathi Marathinglish Marwari Mauritian Creole Mewari Nepali Neplish Norwegian Odinglish Oriya Pashto Persian Polish Portuguese (Brazil) Portuguese (Portugal) Punglish Punjabi Rajasthani Romanian Russian Sanskrit Scottish Gaelic Serbian (Cyrillic) Serbian (Latin) Sesotho (Lesotho) Sesotho (South Africa) Sindhi Singlish (Sri Lanka) Sinhala Slovak Slovenian SMS (Brazil) SMS (English) Spanish (Latin America) Spanish (Spain) Spanish (US) Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Tanglish Telugu Tenglish Thai Turkish Turkmen Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Xhosa Yoruba Zulu

The Task Manager allows viewing and stopping processes, services and tasks. Its main features include application management, process management, battery and other system information. With the auto stop feature processes can be stopped periodically. Notes: The SD card icon can only be shown with Android 2.3 and above. If you don't need a task manager, you can check out the Application Manager, the Battery Display App or the CPU Display App for some of its functions. Close processes: In Android it is possible, that some processes with services (e.g. the Battery Display) will be restarted directly by the system, after they were closed. This behaviour exists in some other task managers, too (e.g. the one of the Galaxy S2). Some processes cannot be killed (noticed on the Galaxy S2 with Android 4.0.4). I am looking for an option, to close processes not the 'light way'. I think you need 'Root' then. Update notes: All services of the application will be stopped during the update. Please go to the auto stop feature activity and leave it again to restart them. If the services are not running, no auto stop will occur.

Play this new girl game with two sweet girls. Lora and Sonia are two friends who love each other very much. They just organized a birthday party and they need to look very nice. Both of them have more or less the same style but different clothes. First you have to make them both up. Now you have the oportunity in this free makeup game to combine the eyeshade with the colour of the lipstick and choose a blush that you like the most. You must know that this game is also a dressup game and you must find a nice outfit for both Sonia and Lora. One that you think goes best for a birthday party. You can opt for a casual look for now because maybe they are eating outside or if you want you can put a nice dress on both of them. Whichever you prefer most. Do not forget about the accessories. Make sure they go with the rest of the outfit. Maybe some tights would look nice. Enjoy this game for girls! Use mouse to play this couple girl dressup.

description: T0 try ad-free version of this app click on below link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shield.my_distance_meter_pro Friends this free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen. Have you ever thought of finding out the distance between two places that you are traveling? Ever thought of using your smartphone for the purpose of finding the distance? If yes, then here's an opportunity.. Just install the application, and wait for the GPS signal to be stable. Once this is done, just kick the start button from the start point.. Once you have reached the destination, press the stop button to stop measuring the distance. This is a map based application. The application gives you the total distance covered by you in meters, kilometers and miles. Time taken to cover the distance is also mentioned. The start point is marked by a green marker while the end point is marked by red marker. A green pin is provided to show the current position.... Features. 1. Markers provided to show the current position, start point and end point on the map. 2. Different views for maps are provided 3. Three units of measuring distance (m, km, mi). 4. History Screen (Map View)

description: You can't bend sticks more than a right angle... That is the only rule in the game. Stick Arts is a simple puzzle game for android phones and tablets that challenge players to draw geometric shapes with pieces of stick. Here is how to play the game.. Drag a piece of stick into a node of the image (always start with one corner of the stick) and place it along the lines of the image (until the stick is tied to the nodes at both ends of the line). You can bend the sticks from the node. Only thing you can't do is to bend the stick more than a right angle. If you can't think of a solution, you can always get some hints. (You can easily ask for hints in the first 3 levels. But for later levels, you will have to do some work to get hints). But you will feel better, if you can do it your own. Have fun..
release_text: Fixed bugs reported by users. (Thanks for reporting them.) Fixed a problem in 35th levels. (some answers were not accepted in earlier versions, fixed it in 1.04 onwards). Added app sharing capability. Altogether 66 brain-teasing levels.

description: 巨大企業の陰謀を阻止せよ！ 近未来の密閉都市を舞台にしたサイバーパンクRPG『サイバーロード～完全都市～』 【アプリ概要】 時は2173年、人類の生存範囲は激減…… 人々は企業により統治されたアルコロジーと呼ばれるタワー型密閉都市で生きていた。 人々を圧政により支配していた巨大企業マッコイ・コーポレーションと、 レジスタンスに協力する傭兵ジェシーとの戦いが今始まる！ 近未来、サイバーパンクが好きな人にはおすすめのRPG！ 【特長】 1) 作り込まれた世界観！ 巨大企業都市の頂点に君臨するドノバン・マッコイ。 マッコイの圧政に立ち向かい人々の希望となる反企業組織トール。 アルコロジーで繰り広げられる両者の激しい戦いの中で主人公のジェシーはトールに協力する。 有能な仲間たちや謎の人工知能オメガと共に、圧政に苦しむ市民を救うことはできるか！？ 2) 仲間と共に戦え！ 戦闘はリアルタイムに展開される。 仲間には個別でも一括でも命令することができる。 装備する武器の攻撃範囲に入った敵を自動的に攻撃するため、 仲間がまとまっていることで戦闘は有利に展開する。 チームワークを駆使し、仲間と協力して強敵を打ち倒そう！ 3) 特殊な装備『ナノギア』！ 身体の各部位に直接埋め込むことで力を発揮する「ナノギア」。 手や足に埋め込んで戦闘力をアップする戦闘支援系ナノギアや、 身体や頭に埋め込んで姿を消したり、敵を操る特殊系ナノギアなど、その種類は様々。 ナノギアを使いこなすことができれば、向かうところ敵なし。 4) 武器の選択が鍵を握る！ ハンドガンやライフルと言った飛び道具から、剣や刀などの近接武器、 複数の敵に有効な手榴弾、地面に設置して自動的に敵を攻撃してくれるオートガンや地雷など種類は多彩。 状況に応じた武器を選び出し、敵との戦いに勝利しよう！ ■動作確認端末 ※一部サポート対象外となる端末があります。 以下の端末で動作確認を行っております。 OS：Android 2.3 NTT docomo GALAXY Note SC-05D, L-07C, P-01D au IS11CA, IS11S, IS12M, IS12S, IS14SH, INFORBARC01, ARROWS Z ISW11F, IS11N, IS12F, IS13SH, ISW11K, ISW11M OS：Android 4.0 NTT docomo N-04D, N-05D, N-07D, P-02D, P-04D, P-06D, P-07D, SH-01D, SH-06D, T-02D, GALAXY NEXUS SC-04D, GALAXY Note SC-05D, GALAXY Tab 7.7 Plus SC-01E, SO-01E, SO-02D, SO-03D, Galaxy 10.1 SC-01D au ISW13HT, ISW16SH, URBANO PROGRESSO, IS17SH, CAL21, IS17SH, IS15SH, IS13F, OS：Android 4.1 NTT Docomo N-04E, N-05E, SH-09D, SH-10D, GALAXY Note II SC-02E, GALAXY S III α SC-03E, GALAXY S III SC-06D, L-01E, L-05D, SO-04D au AQUOS PAD SHT21, GALAXY S III Progre SCL21, SOL21, PTL21, HTL21, HTX21, SHL21, SOL22, SHT21, HTL22 Willcom WX04K OS：Android 4.2 NTT Docomo F-06E, SH-06E, GALAXY S4 SC-04E, L-05E, P-03E au FJL22、KYY21 OS：Android 4.3 NTT Docomo SC-01F OS：Android 4.4 NTT Docomo SCL23 au KYY23、SOL23 (C) www.handy-games.com GmbH / Worker Bee Inc. ※本アプリ『サイバーロード～完全都市～』はデベロッパー：HandyGames の『Cyberlords - アルコロジー』の日本向けバージョンとなります。日本向けに一部仕様を変更しております。 ※本アプリ『サイバーロード～完全都市～』はデベロッパー：HandyGames からライセンスを許諾され、配信をしております。 ※This application “サイバーロード～完全都市～” is a special version for the Japanese market of the “Cyberlords - description: Browse our huge range of used cars for sale right across the UK with the Motors.co.uk car search on your Android Smart Phone. Our nifty Motors.co.uk search app connects you to our huge list of used cars for sale across the UK from both large franchise and independent car dealers - as well as private individuals and leading car supermarkets . Use our powerful search tool to find your ideal second hand car, then browse the results, see pictures and contact the seller. Key Features: • Choose multiple Makes & Models • Refine search by Distance, Price, Mileage, Age, Transmission, Fuel type & Color. • Sort results by Distance, Price & Mileage • Save your search criteria • Add cars to your shortlist • View full screen car images • Show car location on map

description: The Oxford Dictionary of English is a mobile dictionary with content from Oxford University Press, with advanced search and language tools that have become the staple of quality language apps from MobiSystems. WHAT MAKES OXFORD DICTIONARY OF ENGLISH BETTER THAN OTHER DICTIONARIES?  • The most comprehensive coverage of English everywhere it’s spoken  • The very latest vocabulary, with over 350,000 words, phrases and meanings  • Thousands of words and sentences derived from the latest research of the Oxford English Corpus  • 75,000 audio pronunciations of both common and rare words, including words with controversial or variant pronunciations Ideal for professionals, students, and academics, as well as anyone who needs a comprehensive and authoritative dictionary of current English at work or at home. SEARCH TOOLS - effortlessly find words thanks to a clear, functional, and easy-to-use interface. Intelligent search integrates several tools to match or suggest what you are looking for:  • Search autocomplete helps find words quickly by displaying predictions as you type  • Keyword lookup allows you to search within compound words and phrases  • An automatic ‘Fuzzy filter’ to correct word spelling, as well as ‘Wild card’ ('*' or '?') to replace a letter or entire parts of a word  • Camera search looks up words in the camera viewfinder and displays results LEARNING TOOLS - engaging features that help you further enhance your vocabulary.  • ‘Favorites’ feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library  • ‘Recent’ list to easily review looked-up words  • ‘Word of the day’ section to expand your vocabulary daily  • Home screen widget provides random words at a glance EVEN MORE:  • Audio pronunciation - listen to how words are pronounced  • Offline mode - look up words without an internet connection * Includes small apps extension for Sony products *
release_text: Version 5.0.4 * Fixed search issue Version 5.0.3 * Fixed issue with filters * General improvements Version 5.0.1 * Completely redesigned user experience * Ability to share word definitions * New camera search function * ‘Word of the Day’ feature * Performance improvements Version 4.3.103 * Optimized for Sony Small Apps
